SIMRES.SCRIPT:
# use with BEER_PS2_sample.xml #--------------------------------------------------
# wavelength range 0.6 .. 3.6 A set INST LAMBDA 2.1 set SOURCE LAMW 1.42857
# adjust DET1D plot cmd DET1D NP 3000 cmd DET1D X0 1.4 cmd DET1D DX 1.5 cmd DET1D XAUTO 0 cmd DET1D CAUTO 0 cmd DET1D ERR 1
XML UPDATE
# Simulate primary beam #---------------------------------------- set TR MODE 0 CNT 500000 XML UPDATE DO MC
# Plot and save ToF spectrum BREF SAMPLE_I cmd BEAM1D X 6 cmd BEAM1D ERR 1 DO BEAM1D cmd GRSAVE FILE PS2_spectrum.dat cmd GRSAVE OVER no do GRSAVE
# save input events BREF SAMPLE_I MCPEX beam_inc_PS2.mcpl 1
#-------------------------------------- # simulate secondary beam #-------------------------------------- set TR MODE 1 set TR SPLIT 10 XML UPDATE
# optional: load input from mcpl BREF SAMPLE_I MCPIN beam_inc_PS2.mcpl 1
# important ! BREF DET
# whole detector #----------------------- set MOND X0 0.0 set MOND DX 1000.0 XML MOND set TR MODE 1
# diffractogram set PCRYST TYPE 2 XML UPDATE set TR MODE 1 DO MC cmd DET1D COM duplex steel, PS2, full DO DET1D cmd GRSAVE FILE PS2_duplex_full.dat cmd GRSAVE OVER no do GRSAVE
# background set PCRYST TYPE 1 set PCRYST SIGSC 0.1 XML UPDATE DO MC cmd DET1D COM background, PS2, full DO DET1D cmd GRSAVE FILE PS2_bcg_full.dat cmd GRSAVE OVER no do GRSAVE
#---------------------- # partial detectors #----------------------- set TR SPLIT 10 XML UPDATE
#-------------------------------------------- set MOND X0 -450 set MOND DX 100.0 XML MOND
# diffractogram set PCRYST TYPE 2 XML UPDATE DO MC cmd DET1D COM duplex steel, PS2, -45 cm DO DET1D cmd GRSAVE FILE PS2_duplex_-45.dat cmd GRSAVE OVER no do GRSAVE
# background set PCRYST TYPE 1 set PCRYST SIGSC 0.1 XML UPDATE DO MC cmd DET1D COM background, PS2, -45 cm DO DET1D cmd GRSAVE FILE PS2_bcg_-45.dat cmd GRSAVE OVER no do GRSAVE
#-------------------------------------------- set MOND X0 -350 set MOND DX 100.0 XML MOND
# diffractogram set PCRYST TYPE 2 XML UPDATE DO MC cmd DET1D COM duplex steel, PS2, -35 cm DO DET1D cmd GRSAVE FILE PS2_duplex_-35.dat cmd GRSAVE OVER no do GRSAVE
# background set PCRYST TYPE 1 set PCRYST SIGSC 0.1 XML UPDATE DO MC cmd DET1D COM background, PS2, -35 cm DO DET1D cmd GRSAVE FILE PS2_bcg_-35.dat cmd GRSAVE OVER no do GRSAVE
#-------------------------------------------- set MOND X0 -250 set MOND DX 100.0 XML MOND
# diffractogram set PCRYST TYPE 2 XML UPDATE DO MC cmd DET1D COM duplex steel, PS2, -25 cm DO DET1D cmd GRSAVE FILE PS2_duplex_-25.dat cmd GRSAVE OVER no do GRSAVE
# background set PCRYST TYPE 1 set PCRYST SIGSC 0.1 XML UPDATE DO MC cmd DET1D COM background, PS2, -25 cm DO DET1D cmd GRSAVE FILE PS2_bcg_-25.dat cmd GRSAVE OVER no do GRSAVE
#-------------------------------------------- set MOND X0 -150 set MOND DX 100.0 XML MOND
# diffractogram set PCRYST TYPE 2 XML UPDATE DO MC cmd DET1D COM duplex steel, PS2, -15 cm DO DET1D cmd GRSAVE FILE PS2_duplex_-15.dat cmd GRSAVE OVER no do GRSAVE
# background set PCRYST TYPE 1 set PCRYST SIGSC 0.1 XML UPDATE DO MC cmd DET1D COM background, PS2, -15 cm DO DET1D cmd GRSAVE FILE PS2_bcg_-15.dat cmd GRSAVE OVER no do GRSAVE
#-------------------------------------------- set MOND X0 -50 set MOND DX 100.0 XML MOND
# diffractogram set PCRYST TYPE 2 XML UPDATE DO MC cmd DET1D COM duplex steel, PS2, -5 cm DO DET1D cmd GRSAVE FILE PS2_duplex_-5.dat cmd GRSAVE OVER no do GRSAVE
# background set PCRYST TYPE 1 set PCRYST SIGSC 0.1 XML UPDATE DO MC cmd DET1D COM background, PS2, -5 cm DO DET1D cmd GRSAVE FILE PS2_bcg_-5.dat cmd GRSAVE OVER no do GRSAVE
#-------------------------------------------- set MOND X0 50 set MOND DX 100.0 XML MOND
# diffractogram set PCRYST TYPE 2 XML UPDATE DO MC cmd DET1D COM duplex steel, PS2, 5 cm DO DET1D cmd GRSAVE FILE PS2_duplex_5.dat cmd GRSAVE OVER no do GRSAVE
# background set PCRYST TYPE 1 set PCRYST SIGSC 0.1 XML UPDATE DO MC cmd DET1D COM background, PS2, 5 cm DO DET1D cmd GRSAVE FILE PS2_bcg_5.dat cmd GRSAVE OVER no do GRSAVE
#-------------------------------------------- set MOND X0 150 set MOND DX 100.0 XML MOND
# diffractogram set PCRYST TYPE 2 XML UPDATE DO MC cmd DET1D COM duplex steel, PS2, 15 cm DO DET1D cmd GRSAVE FILE PS2_duplex_15.dat cmd GRSAVE OVER no do GRSAVE
# background set PCRYST TYPE 1 set PCRYST SIGSC 0.1 XML UPDATE DO MC cmd DET1D COM background, PS2, 15 cm DO DET1D cmd GRSAVE FILE PS2_bcg_15.dat cmd GRSAVE OVER no do GRSAVE
#-------------------------------------------- set MOND X0 250 set MOND DX 100.0 XML MOND
# diffractogram set PCRYST TYPE 2 XML UPDATE DO MC cmd DET1D COM duplex steel, PS2, 25 cm DO DET1D cmd GRSAVE FILE PS2_duplex_25.dat cmd GRSAVE OVER no do GRSAVE
# background set PCRYST TYPE 1 set PCRYST SIGSC 0.1 XML UPDATE DO MC cmd DET1D COM background, PS2, 25 cm DO DET1D cmd GRSAVE FILE PS2_bcg_25.dat cmd GRSAVE OVER no do GRSAVE
#-------------------------------------------- set MOND X0 350 set MOND DX 100.0 XML MOND
# diffractogram set PCRYST TYPE 2 XML UPDATE DO MC cmd DET1D COM duplex steel, PS2, 35 cm DO DET1D cmd GRSAVE FILE PS2_duplex_35.dat cmd GRSAVE OVER no do GRSAVE
# background set PCRYST TYPE 1 set PCRYST SIGSC 0.1 XML UPDATE DO MC cmd DET1D COM background, PS2, 35 cm DO DET1D cmd GRSAVE FILE PS2_bcg_35.dat cmd GRSAVE OVER no do GRSAVE
#-------------------------------------------- set MOND X0 450 set MOND DX 100.0 XML MOND
# diffractogram set PCRYST TYPE 2 XML UPDATE DO MC cmd DET1D COM duplex steel, PS2, 45 cm DO DET1D cmd GRSAVE FILE PS2_duplex_45.dat cmd GRSAVE OVER no do GRSAVE
# background set PCRYST TYPE 1 set PCRYST SIGSC 0.1 XML UPDATE DO MC cmd DET1D COM background, PS2, 45 cm DO DET1D cmd GRSAVE FILE PS2_bcg_45.dat cmd GRSAVE OVER no do GRSAVE
